name: Shield Ball VR
description:
Shield Ball is a VR arcade game. Use your shield to block and redirect the ball to score points!
The only game mode is Endless, feel free to share your highscores!

Press any button on the Touch controllers to start or restart the game!

The theme "once upon a terrible time" was for the development of the game. Originally we wanted to implement the theme in 'terrible' power-ups/downs, but time didn't allow for this.

Made in Unity with Oculus XR in Unity, so only Oculus Rift (Desktop) platforms are supported as of now.
Support for the Oculus Quest is only tested on a Quest 2 and the .apk file needs to be installed using SideQuest.
Support for all VR headsets will be implemented once OpenXR is stable in Unity!
